segments.text: Hello , Tom , are you free next Sunday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . Why did you ask that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to have my first baby , so I plan to hold a baby shower next Sunday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations ! Why do people hold parties before the baby is born ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the tradition . But baby showers as we know them today were not common until after World Warri .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In any case , I like baby showers , because they allow friends and family to share the joy and excitement of welcoming a new life into the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you will come , won't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I will prepare a good gift for the new arrival .
segments.speaker: S2
